news.title: Zelensky warns against giving away territory as latest Ukraine talks end
news.summary: There was optimism following the talks in Geneva, but no details emerged on how to bridge the huge divide between Moscow and Kyiv over territory and security guarantees.

news.title: Boy with rare condition amazes doctors after world-first gene therapy
news.summary: Oliver, 3, now appears to be developing normally after taking part in a trial to treat Hunter syndrome that almost didn't get off the ground.

news.title: Police officer unable to dress after hammer attack by Palestine Action activist, jury told
news.summary: The officer could not drive, shower or dress herself after being struck with a sledgehammer.

news.title: Ten-year-old British chess prodigy dazzles at women's event
news.summary: Bodhana Sivanandan wins the UK Womenâ€™s Blitz Championship, putting her in the top 50 women in the world in the category.

news.title: Two peers to be suspended from House of Lords for breaking rules
news.summary: Former Army chief Lord Richard Dannatt and businessman Lord Evans of Watford face suspensions.

news.title: I watched helplessly as gunmen snatched my son, says father after Nigerian school kidnapping
news.summary: The authorities are trying to rescue more than 250 schoolchildren who were abducted by raiders on motorbikes.

news.title: Police face misconduct inquiry in case of murdered Harshita Brella
news.summary: Four Northamptonshire Police officers will face misconduct proceedings, the force says.

news.title: Obesity jab drug fails to slow Alzheimer's
news.summary: There were initial hopes that the drug in weight loss jab Wegovy could slow progression of dementia.

news.title: Jimmy Cliff, reggae singer with a run of hits spanning decades, dies aged 81
news.summary: The musician was known for hits like You Can Get It If You Really Want and I Can See Clearly Now.

news.title: What can nervous businesses expect from the Budget?
news.summary: It is going to be a nail-biting final few days for business leaders, says the BBC's Business Editor, Simon Jack.
